snippet.title: Jonathan Kreisberg Lick on Ab Major
snippet.description:
Jonathan Kreisberg Lick on Ab Major
6 Apr 2009 by rickstonemusic on Rick Stone's Music Blog rickstonemusic.wordpress.com/2009/04/05/jonathan-kreisberg-lick-on-ab-major/
Transcribing licks and phrases is great for building technique and a good jazz vocabulary. The following phrase is one I've heard Jonathan Kreisberg use regularly. Practice it in all keys by transposing up and down the neck.
